name: Heavy Blade (itch)
description:
Heavy Blade 

Will you be able to survive the swarms of spiders?

You only have a giant blade and a ton of powerups to help you.

Try not to die and get the highest score in this tiny 2 button-controls game.

Heavy blade is a tiny game created by my humble self for 8bitstoinfinity/scorejam game jams.

The goal was to create a game within 3 days with certain limitations:

-Arcade controls, 2 directions and a "button"

-Highscore system implemented in order for players to be able to compete

-The theme was "Swarms"
